name: Automatic
description: This weapon can use automatic fire, which gives you either +area or +1 harm. Use of automatic fire will hasten the need to reload.

name: Area
description: This weapon can hit multiple foes. You may divide the harm you inflict among multiple targets.

name: Balanced
description: This weapon is easy to wield and hold on to.

name: Close
description: This weapon is effective at fairly close quarters – outside arms' reach, but not too far.

name: Far
description: This weapon is effective at long range.

name: Fire
description: The weapon sets things on fire.

name: Hand
description: This weapon is effective at a hand to hand combat range – within arms' reach.

name: Healing
description: This weapon transfers life energy: the wielder is healed for as many points of harm as were inflicted. E.g. if you inflict 2-harm, then you get healed for 2-harm of your injuries.

name: Heavy
description: This weapon is heavy and difficult to wield.

name: Holy
description: This weapon has been blessed. This will be more effective against monsters with a weakness to holy items.

name: Ignore-Armour
description: This weapon ignores protective armour. Armour has no effect on the harm it causes. If armour has the magic tag, then a weapon needs both ignore-armour and magic to bypass the armour.

name: Innocuous
description: This weapon doesn't draw suspicion.

name: Intimate
description: This weapon is effective at the closest of quarters – within the embrace of your foe.

name: Loud
description: This weapon is loud enough that it draws attention.

name: Magic
description: This weapon is enchanted, and so can affect certain creatures that are proof against normal weapons.

name: Many
description: These weapons are small enough you can carry a large number of them.

name: Messy
description: This weapon spreads a lot of blood and gore around.

name: Quick
description: This weapon is quick to prepare and attack with.

name: Reload
description: This weapon has limited ammunition, and may run out at a bad time and need to be reloaded.

name: Slow
description: This weapon is slow to prepare and attack with.

name: Small
description: This weapon is tiny and easy to conceal.

name: Unreliable
description: This weapon needs regular cleaning and maintenance, otherwise it just isn't gonna work.

name: Useful
description: This weapon has other uses aside from violence.

name: Valuable
description: This weapon is antique, or made of valuable materials.

name: Volatile
description: This weapon is dangerous and unstable.
